description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Make your spinning, sizzling way along the road as fast as you can without falling through the gaps.  Simple?  Few will be good or fast enough to complete all 20 stunning 3D levels, but everyone can enjoy the 2-player battle mode - smack your opponent's ball around in the race to the line!  Can YOU find your way to the top of the global online score table?
